actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to prohibit use in a fiscal year of amounts in the Land and Water Conservation Fund for acquiring land or waters for the National Wildlife Refuge System if wildlife refuge revenue sharing payments have not been made for the preceding fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends the Land Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to prohibit use in a fiscal year of amounts in the Land and Water Conservation Fund for acquiring land or waters for the National Wildlife Refuge System if wildlife refuge revenue sharing payments have not been made for the preceding fiscal year by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: To amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to prohibit use in a fiscal year of amounts in the Land and Water Conservation Fund for acquiring land or waters for the National Wildlife Refuge System if wildlife refuge revenue sharing payments have not been made for the preceding fiscal year.
